title: Google | L3 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier-1 college.
Years of Experience: 1.5
Prior Experience: product based company
Date of the Offer: Feb 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: SWE 2/ L3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 21,20,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 6,00,000
Stock bonus: 11,50,000 (38%, First year)
Bonus: 3,18,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 41,88,000
Benefits: Standard google benefits
Other details: None

- All Amounts in INR

Current CTC: 20L

Interview experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/4740723/Google-L3-or-Selected
